answers.answer: I feel the same way with my breathing all I do is take deep breath and relax.
When I feel like that I have to lay down and it helps
Are you swelling? Protein in your pee? You may be at risk for preeclampsia.

Oh my gosh, this sounds like me - shortness of breath, chest pain, dizziness/ringing ears. Been going on for 7 days now. My OB sent me to L&D yesterday. EKG/CXR both came back normal. I have an appt tmrw for further checkup. Every couple of days, I woke up in the middle of night due to chest pain and SOB. Just couldn't figure out what's causing it.
I know its ao weird annie777
If u look up symptoms of low iron is shows most of what were experiencing annie777

question: Ok so I'm 2 days away from 22 weeks and my ears are ringing like 3 times a day and my breathing gets harder and harder. I'm sitting here on the couch and I feel like I have something sittin on my chest. Is this normal??
title: getting nervous
